verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Bwana moyo wangu
hauna kiburi nayo macho
yangu hayainuki). x2
(Wala sijishughulishi
na mambo makuu
yanayozishinda nguvu zangu). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hakika nimetuliza nafsi yangu
na pia kuinyamazisha.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kama mtoto aliyeachishwa
ziwa kifuani mwa mama yake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ndivyo roho yangu ilivyo kwangu
mimi tangu leo hata milele.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
M-tumaini Bwana ee Israeli
tangu leo hata milele.
